import React from "react" const tempInfo = { "deckTitle": "Title", "deckInfo": "Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah Blah", "deckSize": "3" } function deckMaker(){ return (
{tempInfo.deckTitle}

{tempInfo.deckSize} cards

{tempInfo.deckInfo}

) } export default deckMaker;
